ygData.subject: Re: Now about 1hs vs. 2hs Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: or crash with 6 bags full of your parties FS weapons.....I quit using those bags in beta when I had put a BBC in one while making room and crashed and lost it.
ygData.messageBody:
or crash with 6 bags full of your parties FS weapons.....I quit using those bags in beta when I had put a BBC in one while making room and crashed and lost it. magic bags are great for carrying heavy low priced items, but NEVER EVER EVER put a magic weapon in one, or anything of significan value.

>>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.25.99 2:41:35 AM >>>
From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>


> Weight also impacts your possible lootage potential; lighter 'carry'
> gear/weapons = more loot to take back! This has got to be a good
> thing, neh?
>
Two words for you - dimensional bags.

Just dont do what I have done, log out with 5 full dimensional bags of loot.
